name: Black Sheep Farm
description:
It's hunting season. Black wool is the new white wool. Everyone wants to wear black wool. Everyone wants your black wool. Hunters wear black wool. Hunters are after your black wool. But hunters still gonna hunt white wool. Be the hunter. Don't just be the black sheep. Be the hunter black sheep.  Don't be the prey. Prey is for white sheep. Prey is not for black sheep. Black sheep is for hunter.

Point and click your way to turn this White Sheep Farm into a Black Sheep Farm. Be one with the black sheep. Eat all the white sheep.

Works Cited

OddPotato Fantasy 16x16 Asset Pack (for OddPotato Jam game submission)
